name: @youthfulhps/prettier-plugin-tailwindcss-normalizer
description: A Prettier plugin that normalizes Tailwind CSS arbitrary values into standard utility classes.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push origin main --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push origin main --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push origin main --tags
scripts.test:local: npm run build && npm pack && echo '✅ Local test package created! Use the .tgz file to test in other projects.'
scripts.test:install: npm run test:local && npm install -g $(ls *.tgz | head -1) && echo '✅ Global installation completed!'
scripts.test:link: npm run build && npm link && echo '✅ npm link completed! Run npm link prettier-plugin-tailwindcss-normalizer in other projects.'

author: Your Name
